We are dedicated to the delivery of effective endodontic treatments and contemporary teaching programmes.

Request more information Call us: 0345 363 0400

As an approved academic partner of The University of Chester, simplyendo® delivers the Postgraduate Certificate, Postgraduate Diploma, and Masters degree in Endodontology.

Our Endodontic Training Programmes

  • 10 - Day
    Programme

    10 - Day Programme

    In our unique 10-day programme we teach you about the biology of endodontic disease, discuss and demonstrate contemporary techniques, covering all aspects of Endodontology. Upon completion you will be able to carry out root canal treatments with a much more predictable result. This is also an excellent preparation in order to further enhance your education and advance onto a Masters Degree in Endodontology.

  • Postgraduate
    Certificate

    Postgraduate Certificate

    This programme is an additional 6 days (2 days per month) following on from our 10-day programme. This forms Year 1 of the Masters degree. Upon successful completion, you have the choice to exit with a Postgraduate Certificate in Endodontology or advance onto year 2 of the MSc (PG Diploma equivalence) in Endodontology.

  • Postgraduate
    Diploma

    Postgraduate Diploma

    This forms year 2 of the MSc programme. This year teaches you about innovations in endodontics, research methods, statistics and a whole module on endodontic microscopy. Upon successful completion, you have the choice to exit with a Postgraduate Diploma in Endodontology or choose to advance to the 3rd and final year of the MSc in Endodontology.

  • MSc
    in Endodontology

    MSc in Endodontology

    Year 3 and the final year for completing your Masters degree. This is the dissertation stage. Throughout this year a tutor will be assigned to you as a supervisor to support you whilst you work on your dissertation project. Upon successful completion, you will receive the MSc in Endodontology awarded by The University of Chester.

Practical & Relevant

Our programmes provide contemporary in-depth training in the latest endodontic techniques and skills. Increase your confidence in cleaning, shaping and filling root canals.

University Accredited & Perfect For CPD

As an approved Academic Partner of The University of Chester. You can study with us for a Postgraduate Certificate, Diploma and MSc in Endodontology.

No Hidden Fees

£5,000 includes tuition, hand-outs, lunch and refreshments for the 10 day programme. Please note our fees include all course materials and VAT. There are no extras to pay!

Our endodontic training centre is unique in the UK with its state of the art equipment, spacious teaching rooms and a fantastically enthusiastic team.

10-Day Endodontic Programme Details

Our next available simplyendo® 10 day endodontic programme starts January 2022.

Conveniently located in our state of the art training centre in Formby, Liverpool. This programme runs on two consecutive days a month, for 5 months, allowing you to rapidly acquire a new confidence in your endodontic diagnosis, case planning and treatment.

The dates for the modules are:

  • Wednesday 26th and Thursday 27th January 2022
  • Wednesday 16th and Thursday 17th February 2022
  • Wednesday 9th March and Thursday 10th March 2022
  • Wednesday 27th and Thursday 28th April 2022
  • Wednesday 25th and Thursday 26th May 2022

    Data protection

    Here at simplyendo® we take your data and your privacy very seriously. Any data that you provide will be treated with the utmost care and respect, in accordance with data protection legislation.

    We will use the data that you provide until such time as you withdraw your consent for us to do so.

    If you would like more detailed information relating to this or your rights, or who to contact if you have any concerns about the use of your personal data, please go to the privacy policy published on our website.

    Your personal data will not be passed on to any third parties. You can notify simplyendo® at any time if you no longer want to receive information from us by contacting us.
